# action

**Instance Property**

An action for the subscription offers entry point.

## Declaration

```swift
var action: MusicSubscriptionOffer.Action
```

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/MusicSubscriptionOffer/Action/subscribe].
